instruction: Can the combination of Sentinel-1 and Sentinel-2 satellite data be considered a superior method for mapping soil salinization in the Ogan-Kuqa River Oasis compared to traditional methods?

The study used topography indices derived from digital elevation model (DEM), SAR indices generated by Sentinel-1, and vegetation indices generated by Sentinel-2 to map soil salinization.
